name: It's About Time Quiz | Name the Movie | 5 Questions

questions.text: This World War II thriller starred James Garner (best known from "The Rockford Files").
questions.explanation:
36 Hours.

	Plot: A US Army intellegence officer is kidnapped and brainwashed by Nazi doctors.  They try to get him to believe that WWII has been over for years and that he's been suffering recurrent amnesia ever since he was mugged in Spain just before the invasion.  They only have 36 hours to convince him and get him to reveal the Allies' invasion plans for France.

questions.text: A biographical film about American rodeo star Lane Frost.
questions.explanation:
8 Seconds.

	Starred Luke Perry ("Beverly Hills 90210").  (BTW, 8 seconds is the time required for rodeo bull riders to ride and not be disqualified.)

questions.text: This romantic drama starred Kim Basinger and Mickey Rourke.
questions.explanation:
9 1/2 Weeks.

	An erotic story about a woman, the assistant of an art gallery, who gets into an impersonal affair with a man. She barely knows about his life, only about the games they play, so the relationship begins to complicate.  (The affair lasts 9 1/2 weeks, hence the title.)

questions.text: A cop gets a convict temporarily paroled to help him catch a killer.
questions.explanation:
48 Hrs.

	Starred Nick Nolte and Eddie Murphy in his first motion picture.  (48 hours is the amount of time Eddie Murphy's character is paroled for.)

questions.text: This comedy's plot: A child psychiatrist (ironically frustrated by children) discovers his girlfriend is pregnant.  He must come to terms with many issues: marriage, fatherhood, and a psychotic Russian OB/GYN.
questions.explanation:
9 Months.

	Named for the typical length of human gestation.
